Title: Lashtam Pashtam
Writer: Manav Bhalla (story), Nitin Keswani (dialogue), Nitin Keswani (screenplay), Nitin Keswani (story)
Actors: Tisca Chopra, Om Puri, Priyanshu Chatterjee, Ishita Dutta
Plot: Lashtam Pashtam is a drama based in Dubai and explores the bond of friendship between two boys - an Indian and a Pakistani - who are doubles partners in Tennis.
